nl_query: Identify the top 10 suppliers who have consistently provided raw materials on time, with at least 95% order accuracy, over the last decade in North America.
explanation: This query involves joining supplier records with order details and filtering based on geography and performance metrics, which relational databases handle efficiently through indexing and structured joins.

nl_query: Find all employees who have improved their performance ratings by at least 50% over the past five years and have participated in more than two professional development programs.
explanation: This involves analyzing time-series data and complex joins between performance reports and training records.

nl_query: List the top 5 cities where the property tax collection improved by over 20% annually over the past five years while maintaining an average population growth of 3%.
explanation: The query requires aggregating tax collection data along with demographic trends, best handled with relational data aggregations.

nl_query: Select the top 3 contractors who have completed at least 20 infrastructure projects with fewer than 2% cost overruns and no safety incidents in the last ten years.
explanation: These operations involve multiple joins between tables like projects, budgets, and safety records.

nl_query: Identify products whose sales have doubled each quarter in the last two years in at least three different regions.
explanation: You need complex computations on sales trends and geographical data, making use of efficient indexed queries.

nl_query: Determine the top 5 universities whose alumni have generated the highest number of startups valued at over $10 million within five years of graduation.
explanation: This requires linking alumni with their entrepreneurial activities and financial evaluations.

nl_query: Find all industries where the average workforce salaries have increased by at least 5% each year in the last five years, but the employment rate declined.
explanation: It involves complex calculations and comparisons across multiple datasets, including employment and wage data.

nl_query: List the top 10 healthcare providers who have maintained patient satisfaction scores above 95% while reducing their operation costs by at least 10% annually.
explanation: This involves multiple metrics across different database tables, suitable for relational database queries.

nl_query: Identify the top 5 film directors who have produced movies grossing over $100 million but with production budgets under $10 million, over the past decade.
explanation: This requires querying complex data involving movie budgets, revenues, and director records.

nl_query: Select all food suppliers who have reduced delivery times by 30% while maintaining or improving quality scores in urban areas over the past three years.
explanation: It requires indexing across delivery timelines, quality measures, and geographic constraints.

nl_query: Identify the regions where the average house price has doubled in value over the past five years while residency rates increased by 10%.
explanation: Relational databases best handle historical data manipulations and complex joins involving real estate and demographic data.

nl_query: List all authors who have published at least five bestsellers in the last ten years while their books' average ratings stayed above 4.5 stars.
explanation: This query involves complex joins between sales and review databases.

nl_query: Find all companies that have increased their market share by 15% annually in at least two different continents over the past five years.
explanation: Analysis of structured market share data across multiple dimensions (time and location) is ideal for relational databases.

nl_query: Select the top 10 athletes who won at least three international competitions and improved their personal record times in the last five years.
explanation: You need efficient cross-referencing of competition records and performance metrics.

nl_query: Identify all transport companies that have decreased their carbon footprint by 20% per annum while expanding their fleet by at least 10% each year.
explanation: This involves complex environmental impact calculations and inventory expansions best handled relationally.

nl_query: List all technologies filed for patents which later crossed $1 billion in market value within five years, in the tech equipment sector.
explanation: Joins between patent filings and financial market results require complex transactions history analyses.

nl_query: Select the top 5 publishing houses that have consistently succeeded in reducing their book production costs by 10% while increasing sales by 15% annually over the past decade.
explanation: Requires analytics on financials and performance metrics from multiple data sources.

nl_query: Identify cities where energy consumption has decreased by 20% while GDP increased by at least 2% annually over five years.
explanation: Data modeling of economic and energy metrics often involves relational database efficiencies for deriving insights.

nl_query: Find retail chains where, over the past seven years, store openings have grown by 5% annually with a 98% satisfaction score maintained.
explanation: The complexity of transactional and survey data linked over time benefits from the relational model.

nl_query: Select all hospitals where the average recovery times for complex surgeries reduced by at least 15% and patient influx increased by 10% in the past three years.
explanation: Relational joins and subqueries efficiently correlate healthcare results and patient records over time.

nl_query: Identify artists who have exhibited in at least three different countries annually and increased their auction sale prices by 25% each year, over the previous decade.
explanation: Dealing with exhibition and sales records across geographies and times involves relational data efficiencies.

nl_query: List all automobile brands that launched five or more eco-friendly models over the past decade while securing a 25% market growth annually.
explanation: The integration of launch, market, and environmental performance data suits relational structures.

nl_query: Find all schools that improved their student-teacher ratio by 10% each year and exceeded the national standard testing scores by 20% in the last five years.
explanation: Complex educational metrics meshed with standardized result analyses are best handled in a relational framework.

nl_query: Select top 5 financial analysts consistently predicting market trends with over 90% accuracy, achieving at least a 15% portfolio growth in three distinct financial sectors over ten years.
explanation: Historical accuracy indices and cross-sector growth metrics necessitate robust relational querying capabilities.

nl_query: Identify top 5 volunteer organizations where intern participation rose by 10% annually while project impact ratings averaged above 4.7 over the past seven years.
explanation: Multi-dimensional data like volunteer efforts, project links, and ratings are optimized in relational databases.

nl_query: List cities demonstrating a yearly 5% increase in public transport usage while reducing private vehicle emissions by at least 10% over the past decade.
explanation: Transportation and environmental impact metrics integration benefits from the relational structure.

nl_query: Find online platforms where user growth doubled each year and the content approval rating remained above 85% over the last three years.
explanation: Complex user growth trends and feedback loops are efficiently analyzed in relational systems.

nl_query: Select the top 5 regions with the highest increase in renewable energy adoption of over 10% yearly, correlating with an economic growth of at least 3% over five years.
explanation: Developing renewable energy metrics alongside economic indicators fits well with relational models.

nl_query: Identify all software companies where annual revenues doubled over the past five years while customer churn rate remained under 5%.
explanation: Requires complex analyses over time-series financial data and customer retention metrics.

nl_query: List all construction companies that decreased their project completion times by 15% annually with a consistent 98% safety compliance record over the past decade.
explanation: Time efficiency and safety record correlations benefit from relational query optimizations.

nl_query: Find all musical artists with five years of consistent top chart albums released yearly across at least four global markets.
explanation: Performance trends over time, linked with geographic market data, are efficiently managed relationally.

nl_query: Select restaurants that have maintained a 5-star review average while increasing the diversity of their menu offering by 10% every year for the past decade.
explanation: Relational databases can efficiently handle diverse operations data and detailed review correlations.

nl_query: Identify all tourist destinations that saw a 15% increase in visitor numbers yearly while reducing visitor impact on local ecosystems over the past ten years.
explanation: The complex intersection of tourism, impacts, and environmental data cooperatively fits relational databases.

nl_query: List top 5 IT consultants successfully achieving more than 20% annual improvement in client utilization and project execution under budget constraints over the last five years.
explanation: The efficient merger of financial and performance data suits SQL's powerful data relationship handling.
